import React from 'react'; import 'w3-css/w3.css'; import axios from 'axios'; import Logo from "./img/logo.png" import create from "./img/create.png" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import 'w3-css/w3.css'; class CreateGame extends React.Component{ constructor() { super(); this.state = { user: "", pin_game: "" } } crearJuego(nombre){ axios({ method: 'post', url: 'http://localhost:8081/juego/crear-juego', data: {'nombre' : nombre}, headers: {'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' }}) .then( res => { console.log(res.data) } ) } render(){ return(
Create Game Join Game Github

Create Game

JOIN

Developed by Rafael Moreno, Ricardo Velazquez and Eric Gomez

) } } export default CreateGame
